Verses: 1 povaas Pattanavaasalil Poi, Utkaarndhukondirundhaan; Appozhudhu Povaas Solliyirundha Andha Sudhandharavaali Andha Vazhiye Vandhaan; Avanai Nokki: Oi, Endru Per Solli Kooppittu, Inge Vandhu Satru Utkaarum Endraan; Avan Vandhu Utkaarndhaan.
2 appozhudhu Avan Pattanaththu Moopparaanavargalil Paththupperai Azhaiththu, Inge Utkaarungal Endraan; Avargalum Utkaarndhaargal.
3 appozhudhu Avan Andha Sudhandharavaaliyai Nokki: Elimelek Ennum Nammudaiya Sagodharanukku Irundha Vayalnilaththin Pangai Movaap Dhesaththilirundhu Thirumbi Vandha Nagomi Virkappogiraal.

4 aagaiyaal Neer Adhai Ooraarukku Munbaagavum, En Janaththin Moopparukku Munbaagavum Vaangikkollumbadi Umakku Ariyappannavendum Endrirundhen; Neer Adhai Sudhandharamuraiyaaga Meettukkolla Manadhirundhaal, Meettukkollum; Adhai Meettukkolla Manadhillaadhirundhaal, Naan Adhai Ariyumbadikku Enakku Sollum; Ummaiyum Umakkuppinbu Ennaiyum Thavira, Adhai Meetkaththakkavan Veroruvanum Illai Endraan; Adharku Avan: Naan Adhai Meettukkollugiren Endraan.

5 appozhudhu Povaas: Neer Nagomiyin Kaiyile Andha Vayal Nilaththai Vaangugira Naalile Mariththavanudaiya Sudhandharaththil Avan Perai Nilainirkappannumbadikku, Adhai Mariththavan Manaiviyaagiya Movaapiya Sthireeyaana Roodh Kaiyilum Vaangavendiyadhu Endraan.
6 appozhudhu Andha Suudhandharavaali: Naan En Sudhandharaththai Kedukkaadhabadikku, Naan Adhai Meettu Kollamaatten; Naan Meetkaththakkadhai Neer Meettukkollum; Naan Adhai Meettukkollamaatten Endraan.

7 meetkiradhilum Maatrugiradhilum Sagala Kaariyaththaiyum Urudhippaduththum Badikku, Isravelile Poorvakaala Vazhakkam Ennavendraal, Oruvan Than Paadharatchaiyai Kazhatri, Matravanukku Koduppaan, Idhu Isravelile Vazhangina Urudhippaadu.
8 appadiye Andha Sudhandharavaali Povaasai Nokki: Nee Adhai Vaangikkollum Endru Solli, Than Paadharatchaiyai Kazhatri Pottaan.

9 appozhudhu Povaas Moopparaiyum Sagala Janangalaiyum Nokki: Elimelekkukku Irundha Ellaavatraiyum Kiliyonukkum Maklonukkum Irundha Ellaavatraiyum Nagomiyin Kaiyile Vaangikkonden Enbadharku Indraiyadhinam Neengal Saatchi.

10 idhuvumallaamal, Mariththavanudaiya Sagodhararukkullum, Ooraarukkullum, Avanudaiya Per Atru Pogaamal, Mariththavanudaiya Sudhandharaththile Avan Perai Nilainiruththa, Naan Maklonin Manaiviyaayirundha Movaapiya Sthireeyaana Rooththai Enakku Manaiviyaaga Konden; Adharkum Indraiya Dhinam Neengal Saatchi Endraan.

11 appozhudhu Olimugavaasalil Irukkira Sagala Janangalum Moopparaanavargalum Avanai Nokki: Naangal Saatchidhaan; Un Veettile Varugira Manaiviyai Karththar Isravel Veettai Kattuviththa Iranduperaagiya Raakelai Polavum Leyaalaippolavum Vaazhndhirukka Seyvaaraaga: Nee Eppiraaththaavile Paakkiyavaanaayirundhu, Bedhlekemile Pugazhpetrirukkakkadavaai.
12 indha Penniaththile Karththar Unakku Aruliseyyappogira Santhaanaththinaale, Un Veedu Thaamaar Yoodhaavukku Petra Peresin Veettaippola Aagakkadavadhu Endraargal.
13 povaas Rooththai Vivaagam Panninaan; Aval Avanukku Manaiviyaanaal; Avan Avalidaththil Piravesiththapodhu, Aval Karppandhariththu, Oru Aanpillaiyai Perak Karththar Anukkiragampanninaar.
14 appozhudhu Sthireegal Nagomiyai Paarththu: Sudhandharavaali Atruppogaadhabadikku Indru Unakku Dhayaiseydha Karththarukku Sthoththiram; Avan Per Isravelile Pirabalamaagakkadavadhu.

15 avan Un Aaththumaavukku Aarudhal Seyigravanum, Un Mudhirvayadhile Unnai Aadharikkiravanumaayirukkakkadavan; Unnai Sinegiththu, Ezhu Kumaararaippaarkkilum Unakku Arumaiyaayirukkira Un Marumagal Avanai Petraale Endraargal.
16 nagomi Andha Pillaiyai Eduththu, Than Madiyile Vaiththu, Adhai Valarkkira Thaayaanaal.
17 ayal Veettukkaarigal Nagomikku Oru Aanpillai Pirandhadhu Endru Vaazhththi, Adharku Opedh Endru Perittaargal; Avan Thaaveedhin Thagappanaagiya Eesaayin Thagappan.
18 peresudaiya Sandhadhiyin Varalaaru: Peres Esronai Petraan.
19 esron Raamai Petraan; Raam Amminadhaapai Petraan.
20 amminadhaa Nakasonai Petraan; Nakason Salmonai Petraan.
21 salmon Povaasai Petraan; Povaas Opedhai Petraan.
22 opedh Eesaayai Petraan; Eesaai Thaaveedhai Petraan.
